root: ^I hope you are well. I have been praying for you.
^Would you like me to go over your current quest again?

c-0: ^I wish you best of luck, then. Until we next meet... I will pray for you.
c-1: ^Our previous refugees have gone missing during their supply runs in the Enchanted Forest.
^You may enter the Forest by walking right outside the Church. Beware, for it is infested with violent Beasts.
^I would like you to gather materials from these Beasts for me to craft medicine and food.
^I will need Beast scales and fangs, medicinal tree sap and wild berries. The Beasts near the Church are scrawny and weak, so it should be manageable.
^And, hopefully... you will find someone on your way.
^I will be praying for you, Pilgrim.
